name: Botty McBotman
description:
There are a few very important rules to follow when playing Botty McBotman.

The first rule of Botty McBotman is: do NOT talk about Botty McBotman. Oh wait, hang on... no that's not the first rule.

In fact, it's actually the total opposite.

DO talk about Botty McBotman. Talk to as many people as you can!

For each friend that you invite to play Botty McBotman, three magical things will happen:

1. That friend will become a character in your game and join your team of bots! Woo hoo!
2. You'll become a character in their game! Cool.
3. A pet unicorn will arrive at your door in 3-5 working days. Life-changing!

*Please note that only 2 of the above points are completely true. Unicorns do not make good pets, trust me. It's all about them and they sure do know it.

So tell all of your friends, families, enemies, teachers and pets, but not STRANGERS - never talk to those, especially the ones with (⊙~⊙ ) beady eyes.

The second rule of Botty McBotman is — HAVE FUN. This is quite serious, you must have fun or else, what's the point? Wow... I went a bit deep there. Who writes this stuff?

So what are you waiting for, enough chit-chat, DOWNLOAD Botty McBotman now for FREE!
